mapper.insert: insert into timagestandard (sID, sBusineesCategory, sAccountType, sProofName, sProofAmount) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sbusineescategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saccounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sproofname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sproofamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
